Class Animal

java.lang.Object
  greenfoot.Actor
      Animal

public abstract class Animal
extends greenfoot.Actor

Abstract class created for animal classes to inherit. mainly used for creating animations.

Version:
April 2018
Author:
Kevin Pan Haris Syed
